text: Diana Wills often sat on the brand new seat outside the hospital gates and thought vagrant thoughts. At one time she had watched the workmen constructing the roundabout, which was to put St. John's Casualty Department out of operation - in theory, at least. She would think of herself as a stranger in these parts studying these crossroads. Which one to take?
